snippet: Strong support among black voters has given Eliot Spitzer a significant edge in the New York City comptroller’s race just a few weeks before the Democratic primary.
abstract: Trailside blog; Quinnipiac University poll shows that strong support among black voters is giving Eliot Spitzer significant edge over his opponent Scott M Stringer in New York City comptroller's race, weeks before Democratic primary.
lead_paragraph: Strong support among black voters has given Eliot Spitzer a significant edge in the New York City comptroller’s race just a few weeks before the Democratic primary.

headline.main: Spitzer Has Big Lead Over Stringer, Poll Finds
headline.print_headline:
Spitzer Builds Wide Lead
Over Stringer, Poll Finds
